prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry, chibi proportions with flowing water-drop shaped head with rippling edges and construction paper layers suggesting continuous flow through layered cut-out waves with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating crescent, wave, fractal spiral patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and Vesica Piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like orb of mercy with hexagonal geometric surface with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor OMAGRAP's profile: 'He of lunar knowledge', Aethyr POP, Air element, Tarot The Moon, Sephirot Chesed, Zodiac Pisces, embodying the essence: 'When OMAGRAP is invoked, intuition moves in gentle cycles the atmosphere invites deep reflection as ...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry
visual_elements.head_shape: flowing water-drop shaped head with rippling edges and construction paper layers
visual_elements.body_style: undulating form with wave-like contours, flattened with sharpie-like flow lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting continuous flow through layered cut-out waves with drawn depth

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: orb of mercy with hexagonal geometric surface
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He of lunar knowledge'
profile_data.essence: When OMAGRAP is invoked, intuition moves in gentle cycles the atmosphere invites deep reflection as patterns repeat like comforting lunar phases.
profile_data.angelic_role: Throne of Lunar Reflection; marshals ethereal choristers.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent, mercurial form that shifts between crystalline lunar geometries and organic wave-like movements, representing the liminal space between perception and mystery
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silvery-blue represents lunar consciousness, indigo reflects the depth of POP Aethyr's mystical insight, with shifting patterns mirroring the fluid nature of intuition and Air element's transformative qualities
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Crescent symbolizes lunar knowledge, wave represents Air's fluidity, fractal spiral indicates infinite recursive wisdom of Chesed and mystical understanding
